page.title: 15THE LIGHT HOUSE
page.content:
In Portishead on{Battery Point}there was a light house.It was not very big and nobody was living in it.It stood all alone on the jaggedy worn-away rocks.There was hardly any sea life near the light house but we found two dead crabs but they were only about 1 to 1 and a halve inches wide.But even though the light house was very small you could still see it when you were 1 or 2 miles away.Most of us played near the light house on the rocks; and on the hill,two of my friends fell in the dirty mud near the sea.
By PAUL O,SHEA
